mapper.select: select no, id, name, email from employee where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into employee values(employee_seq.nextval, #{id},#{password},#{name},#{email},#{phone},#{sns, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deptNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{regionNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{code},#{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
